name: Angelic Waves (demo)
description:
Here’s the story about our MC of this visual novel game called Maxwell Cross, a out-of-love person who barley has a social life, got an slight anxiety problem and living in a small apartment.

One day, three new neighbours have move in the luxury suite two floors from you.

Maxwell Cross meets Geline, with long-blonde hair and good-girl personality woman in the lobby. After a short talk, Roya, with short hair and cool-looking woman and Anabelle, a bubbly girl who comes along and greet him. After their talk and helping them moving in, Maxwell returned to his room.

But many days later of getting along with the girls from weeks to weeks, he’ll starting to have feeling for the girls, likewise as the girls. But as a dating sim, you must choose one girl to date. When the relationship grew closer with your chosen girl, the girl shares you a secret that’ll change your life forever.

Why are the girls being so close to each other? Well their love more important than the secret? Will this visual novel protagonist survive the most challenging task ever… a relationship?! Play the game to find out!

Genre: Comedy, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

Romance: B x G 

(Mild Language,)

Bus Arrows Studios is an visual novel and media studio founded and owned by an visual novel developer newcomer, Jaygee598. Which is a supporter of visual novels, voice actors and other visual novel developers in several communities.
